 To apply for admission into the Mpilo Royal College of Health Education MRCHE Application Form 2024, kindly follow the link and apply online. All applications must be submitted online

What to Know About the Mpilo Royal College of Health Education Application Form Portal

The Mpilo Royal College of Health Education MRCHE Application portal is designed to accept applications of candidates seeking admission into the University. In the portal, applicants can Purchase application forms, Track and monitor application status, pay fees, Print Acknowledgement Slips, check the admission list, etc.

Mpilo Royal College of Health Education

Mpilo Royal College of Health Education is a private college located in Johannesburg, South Africa. The college offers a range of health education programs, including nursing, pharmacy, emergency medical care, and community health work.

Here are some key facts about Mpilo Royal College of Health Education:

  • The college was founded in 2007 and is registered with the South African Department of Higher Education and Training.
  • The college offers both certificate and diploma programs in various health fields.
  • The nursing program is accredited by the South African Nursing Council.
  • The pharmacy program is accredited by the South African Pharmacy Council.
  • The college has modern facilities and equipment, including a fully equipped simulation laboratory for nursing and emergency medical care students.
  • The college has a strong focus on practical, hands-on training and provides students with opportunities for clinical placement and internships in various healthcare settings.
  • The college has a dedicated team of qualified and experienced lecturers and support staff who provide academic and personal support to students.
  • The college offers financial aid and scholarships to qualifying students.
  • The college has a strong commitment to community engagement and provides healthcare services to underprivileged communities.

Who is Eligible to Apply for Admission

To be eligible for admission to the MRCHE application portal, candidates must;

  • Have a Secondary School Leaving Certificate
  • Meet National Senior Certificate (NSC) requirement for admission into Higher Certificate
  • Grade 12 certificate applicant is of added advantage
  • Must write the NBTs for admission to MRCHE on/before 15 October 2024.
  • FPS of 480 or above.
  • NBT scores of Upper
  • Intermediate for AL & QL
  • Mathematics 60%
  • English HL 50%
  • English FAL 60%

How to Apply | MRCHE Application Form 2024

The Mpilo Royal College of Health Education provides an online application process for interested applicants. Here are the steps to follow to access the application link:
  1. Go to the Mpilo Royal College of Health Education website at https://www.mrcollege.ac.za/
  2. Click on the “Apply Now” button located on the homepage or in the main menu.
  3. You will be directed to the online application portal.
  4. Create an account and log in to the portal.
  5. Follow the instructions provided on the portal to complete the application form, upload supporting documents, and pay the application fee (if required).
  6. Submit the completed application before the deadline.

 

Mpilo Royal College of Health Education Application Required Documents

To apply to MRCHE you need to submit the following documentation:

  • A completed application form
  • A copy of your results for the latest school year
  • A copy of your ID
  • If you have attended another higher education institution, we need a copy of your academic transcript

For more information regarding the application for admission into the Mpilo Royal College of Health Education, kindly drop your messages in the comment box below.
